verses.name: Luke 8:48
verses.text: And he said unto her, Daughter, be of good comfort: thy faith hath made thee whole; go in peace.

verses.name: Luke 8:49
verses.text: While he yet spake, there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue’s house, saying to him, Thy daughter is dead; trouble not the Master.

verses.name: Luke 8:50
verses.text: But when Jesus heard it, he answered him, saying, Fear not: believe only, and she shall be made whole.

verses.name: Luke 8:51
verses.text: And when he came into the house, he suffered no man to go in, save Peter, and James, and John, and the father and the mother of the maiden.
